name: Kaoru Fujioka
description: Vwas running a job to steal Fujioka'sRayfield Aerondight, but was captured by the police, alongsideJackie Welles. Kaoru then appears shadowed by two large, identical henchmen. As is the norm inNight City, his corporate influence is able to orderInspector Stintsto kill both V and Jackie before dumping their bodies out at sea. Fujioka left the rest to the police, but after beating the two thieves up, Stints lets them go. DuringThe Killing Moon, Kaoru can be found in front ofNCX Spaceport's Terminal C while talking to the phone and standing next to his Aerondight.
